dcterms:creator: A. E. W. Johnson
T. J. Pollard
L. Shen
dcterms:description: MIMIC-III contains de-identified clinical data of over 53,000 hospital admissions for adult patients to the intensive care units (ICU) at the Beth Israel Deaconess Medical Center from 2001 to 2012, including various types of clinical notes such as discharge summaries.
dcterms:title: MIMIC-III

dcterms:creator: O. Uzuner
I. Goldstein
Y. Luo
I. Kohane
dcterms:description: The i2b2 datamarts are used for identifying patient smoking status from medical discharge records, providing a structured approach to extract relevant clinical information.
dcterms:title: i2b2 datamarts
